Detailed Description

Calculates the 3x3 skew symmetric cross product matrix from a vector.

vnl_cross_product_matrix(e) is the matrix [e]_ x: 

       0    -e_3   e_2
       e_3   0    -e_1
      -e_2   e_1   0
